patient_info: Renal potassium wasting,Hypokalemia,Increased urinary potassium,Hypocalciuria,Metabolic alkalosis
golden_diagnosis: Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome,Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome,Gitelman 综合征/Gitelman syndrome; GS/Gitelman syndrome/Gitelman syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
1. Gitelman syndrome (GGT)
2. Addison's disease
3. Hyperparathyroidism
4. Chronic kidney disease (CKD)
5. Electrolyte imbalance (hypokalemia, hypocalcemia)
6. Primary hyperparathyroidism
7. Hypercalcemia
8. Renal cause of hypokalemia (e.g., nephrocalcinosis, chronic kidney disease)
9. Hyperuricemia
10. End-organ damage due to electrolyte imbalance (e.g., chronic kidney disease)
